dt: {bc}a number designating the place (such as first, second, or third) occupied by an item in an ordered sequence {dx}see {dxt|Table of Numbers|number|table}{/dx}
{bc}a number assigned to an ordered set that designates both the order of its elements and its cardinal number

shortdef: a number designating the place (such as first, second, or third) occupied by an item in an ordered sequence
a number assigned to an ordered set that designates both the order of its elements and its cardinal number
